summary: An Alternate path for those who prefer to use the bow in stealth mode. Four levels of Deadly Aim (3x-6x) and a new Perk named Decoy and a restructured perk tree.
descriptionHtml:
An Alternate path for those who prefer to use the bow in stealth mode. Four levels of Deadly Aim (3x-6x) and a new Perk named Decoy and a restructured perk tree.

[color=#00FFFF][b][u]UPDATE[/u][/b][/color]: To correct the balance of gameplay I have changed the mod to have 3x-6x damage. With two optional files which consist of 3x-9x damage and 4x-12x damage respectively. I also changed the prerequisites for Decoy to Deadly Aim 2 OR Assassin\'s Blade and a Sneak of 65.

[u]Deadly Aim:[/u]
Deadly Aim 1 sneak attacks do three times damage. Needs Sneak 30
Deadly Aim 2 sneak attacks do four times damage. Needs Sneak 50
Deadly Aim 3 sneak attacks do five times damage. Needs Sneak 70
Deadly Aim 4 sneak attacks do six times damage. Needs Sneak 90

[u]Decoy:[/u]
Summons a decoy within 50 feet for 30 seconds to distract your enemies while you fire arrows from stealth. It is a Lesser Power and can be summoned at any time but only one instance at a time.
Needs a Sneak of 65 and Deadly Aim 2 [u][b]OR[/b][/u] Assassin\'s Blade.

[u]Other Perk Tree Changes:[/u]
Lightfoot needs either Muffled Movement [u][b]OR[/b][/u] Deadly Aim
Assassin\'s Blade needs Backstab and A Sneak of 50
Silence needs either Silent Roll [u][b]OR[/b][/u] Decoy

[color=#00FFFF][u]Optional Files:[/u][/color]

[u]Deadly Aim 3x-9x (3x,5x,7x,9x)[/u]
Deadly Aim 1 sneak attacks do three times damage. Needs Sneak 30
Deadly Aim 2 sneak attacks do five times damage. Needs Sneak 50
Deadly Aim 3 sneak attacks do seven times damage. Needs Sneak 70
Deadly Aim 4 sneak attacks do nine times damage. Needs Sneak 90

[u]Deadly Aim 4x-12x (4x,6x,9x,12x)[/u]
Deadly Aim 1 sneak attacks do four times damage. Needs Sneak 20
Deadly Aim 2 sneak attacks do six times damage. Needs Sneak 35
Deadly Aim 3 sneak attacks do nine times damage. Needs Sneak 50
Deadly Aim 4 sneak attacks do twelve times damage. Needs Sneak 65

I would like to expand this mod at some point and I\'m open to suggestions.
author: soco11
